definition[0]: a secret group of letters or numbers that you must type into a computer before you can use a system or program
example[0]: Enter your password, then click on the ‘proceed’ icon.
example[1]: Give your user name and password.
definition[1]: a secret word or phrase that someone has to say before they are allowed to enter a place such as a military camp
definition[2]: a series of secret letters or numbers that must be put into a computer before it can be used
example[2]: Some hackers even change the company password, making the system inaccessible to employees.
